name: One Key (TenthosDesigns)
description:
One Key is puzzle-platformer in which your aim is to collect the golden keys.

Collect keys and interact with the environment with [Space]. Shoot the key you currently have loaded by pressing the letter on its face -but be careful- you can only carry one key at a time!

To navigate through the levels you'll have to use your cunning and problem solving to open doors, activate pressure pads and destroy flag switches.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Thank you for playing!
